The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Ramhorn/Injector/Manterror:

::The Oblitercons follow Zardus, getting into CR chambers, Nemesis 
transforming and barely getting into a CR chamber, all six of the robots 
beginning to repaired::

::Ramhorn felt a kick, hitting the ground on his back::
"Slag..."
::Ramhorn took out a wrench from subspace, Manterror grabbing him, lifting 
him up, Ramhorn slamming the wrench down on his head twice, Manterror hitting 
the ground::

::Injector slowly got up, picking up Ramhorn's lost laser pistol, firing off 
two blasts sending Ramhorn to the ground::
